item.description:
Join some "meeting&greeting" group members for dinner and the movie, "The Lucky One", at the Chunkys Cinema located near the Pelham Shopping Center on Route 38 (in the Hannaford Shopping plaza.).

Relax, unwind, eat dinner and then sit back in the nice comfy cadillac recliner seat to enjoy the movie "from the acclaimed bestselling author of The Notebook and Dear John, starring Zac Efron and Taylor Schilling", http://theluckyonemovie.warnerbros.com/index.html

Showtime - 7:00PM, 6:15 in the lobby

Admission - $7.50

"Be the Lucky One",  8 Discount admission tickets available from Susan for $5.00 to first 8 signups.  meet me in the lobby at 6:15pm the latest to get your pass or try texting me, if you get there late.  603-235-9373

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Dinner & Movie-"The Lucky One" in Pelham NH
